rows.label: qev055102_MSG0001
rows.name: Rrrgh! Why did someone have to come along now?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Allow me to deduce the reason for your arrival.
Hmm... Hmmmmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah, yes. Of course. Sun'barac and the others sent you
to rescue me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0004
rows.name:
The tables have turned, Definian. Now it is you who is
cornered, and with an 89.6 percent likelihood of your
own demise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Quiet, fool! And you! Human!
Come any closer, and this one dies.
If you want him to live, you will turn and walk away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_JNK0010
rows.name: Obey

rows.label: qev055102_SEL0011
rows.name: Turn back as the Definian says.

rows.label: qev055102_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev055102_SEL0021
rows.name: Take a provocative step forward.

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0006
rows.name:
How preposterous! Give it the slightest thought,
and it's perfectly obvious she can't kill me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0007
rows.name:
She is clearly under orders to take me back alive.
What happens, then, if she were to kill me now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0008
rows.name:
She would be the next to die, as punishment for
disobeying orders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0009
rows.name:
Definians are hardly precious to the Ganglion.
They are expendable pawns, the same as my kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0010
rows.name:
A wise choiceâ€”she was clearly sent to take me back
alive. A Definian underling like her would not have the
authority to kill me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0011
rows.name:
If that happened, she would be the next to die,
as punishment for disobeying orders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0013
rows.name: Damn you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0014
rows.name: It's true. I can't kill you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0015
rows.name:
...But I can make you WISH for death once I kill this
human![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055102_MSG0016
rows.name:
Time to swat down the flies before picking the legs off
this insect![ST:wait ]
